details:
adjective
- completely unclothed
= synonyms: bare
- lacking any cover
= example: lacking any cover
- devoid of elaboration or diminution or concealment
= synonyms: raw
- having no protecting or concealing cover
= example: having no protecting or concealing cover
= synonyms: defenseless
- (of the eye or ear e.g.) without the aid of an optical or acoustical device or instrument
= example: (of the eye or ear e.g.) without the aid of an optical or acoustical device or instrument
